General.Name: Lian Hwa Foods Corp
General.Description: Lian Hwa Foods Corporation engages in the manufacture, processing, trade, wholesale, and retail of food products in Taiwan. The company's products portfolio include seaweed, fish, noodles, rice, beans, nuts, melon seeds, Jams, beverages, sugar, candy, biscuits, peanut butter, and other products. It also engages in the provision processed, marine and land products, frozen processed, and canned foods; and tobacco and alcohol wholesale and retail activities. The company offers under the KOLOKO, VIVA, CADINA, Moto-Moto-Yama, Chef Hoka, and Lucky Star brand names. Lian Hwa Foods Corporation was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
